Body:
template = """
            <%def name = "adef()" >
              adef
            </%def>
        """
node = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(node, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n            ', (1, 1)),
    DefTag('def', {'name': 'adef()'}, (2, 13), [Text(
    """
              adef
            """, (2, 36))]), Text('\n        ',
    (4, 20))]))
